function.name: zip_close
function.description: Closes the given ZIP file archive.

function.name: zip_entry_close
function.description: Closes the specified directory entry.

function.name: zip_entry_compressedsize
function.description: Returns the compressed size of the specified directory entry.

function.name: zip_entry_compressionmethod
function.description: Returns the compression method of the directory entry specified by zip_entry.

function.name: zip_entry_filesize
function.description: Returns the actual size of the specified directory entry.

function.name: zip_entry_name
function.description: Returns the name of the specified directory entry.

function.name: zip_entry_open
function.description: Opens a directory entry in a zip file for reading.

function.name: zip_entry_read
function.description: Reads from an open directory entry.

function.name: zip_open
function.description: Opens a new zip archive for reading.

function.name: zip_read
function.description: Reads the next entry in a zip file archive.

function.name: addEmptyDir
function.description: Adds an empty directory in the archive.

function.name: addFile
function.description: Adds a file to a ZIP archive from a given path.

function.name: addFromString
function.description: Adds a file to a ZIP archive using its contents.

function.name: close
function.description: Close opened or created archive and save changes. This method is automatically called at the end of the script.

function.name: deleteIndex
function.description: Delete an entry in the archive using its index.

function.name: deleteName
function.description: Delete an entry in the archive using its name.

function.name: extractTo
function.description: Extract the complete archive or the given files to the specified destination.

function.name: getArchiveComment
function.description: Returns the Zip archive comment.

function.name: getCommentIndex
function.description: Returns the comment of an entry using the entry index.

function.name: getCommentName
function.description: Returns the comment of an entry using the entry name.

function.name: getFromIndex
function.description: Returns the entry contents using its index.

function.name: getFromName
function.description: Returns the entry contents using its name.

function.name: getNameIndex
function.description: Returns the name of an entry using its index.

function.name: getStatusString
function.description: Returns the status error message, system and/or zip messages.

function.name: getStream
function.description: Get a file handler to the entry defined by its name. For now it only supports read operations.

function.name: locateName
function.description: Locates an entry using its name.

function.name: open
function.description: Opens a new zip archive for reading, writing or modifying.

function.name: renameIndex
function.description: Renames an entry defined by its index.

function.name: renameName
function.description: Renames an entry defined by its name.

function.name: setArchiveComment
function.description: Set the comment of a ZIP archive.

function.name: setCommentIndex
function.description: Set the comment of an entry defined by its index.

function.name: setCommentName
function.description: Set the comment of an entry defined by its name.

function.name: statIndex
function.description: The function obtains information about the entry defined by its index.

function.name: statIndex
function.description: The function obtains information about the entry defined by its name.

function.name: unchangeAll
function.description: Undo all changes done in the archive.

function.name: unchangeArchive
function.description: Revert all global changes to the archive. For now, this only reverts archive comment changes.

function.name: unchangeIndex
function.description: Revert all changes done to an entry at the given index.

function.name: unchangeName
function.description: Revert all changes done to an entry.
